description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Face off against the computer or three other friends and their avatars in the ultimate sprint. From the 100m dash to a 1500m endurance race, all mixed in with optional hurdles, only one can come away with the gold!
description.short: Face off against the computer or three other friends and their avatars in the ultimate sprint. From the 100m dash to a 1500m endurance race, all mixed in with optional hurdles, only one can come away with the gold!
